title: Shell app scaffolding with layout slots

comments.author: ryan.porter
comments.text:
**As a** user booting the Korporus shell,
**I want to** see a home screen with a grid of app icons,
**so that** I can browse and launch available applications.

Create `apps/shell` as a React + Vite app using shadcn/ui for the design system. The shell has two primary views:

1. **Home screen** — A grid of app icons with labels. Each icon is rendered from manifest data.
2. **App view** — A layout with three named DOM slots: a titlebar area at the top, a main content area in the center, and a settings panel (toggled via a gear icon or similar affordance).

Use shadcn/ui for all UI components (buttons, cards, layout primitives).

### Gherkin

```gherkin
Feature: Shell app scaffolding with layout slots

  Scenario: Home screen renders on boot
    Given the Korporus shell is loaded in a browser
    When the page finishes loading
    Then a home screen with a grid of app icons is displayed

  Scenario: Navigate to app view
    Given the home screen is displayed
    When the user clicks a placeholder app icon
    Then the app view layout is shown with three named slots: titlebar, main content, and settings
    And each slot displays placeholder content

  Scenario: Return to home screen
    Given the app view layout is displayed
    When the user clicks the back/home affordance
    Then the home screen is displayed again
```

### Acceptance Criteria
- The shell app starts with `pnpm dev` and renders the home screen.
- Clicking a placeholder app icon navigates to the app view layout.
- The app view shows the three named slots with placeholder content.
- A back/home affordance returns to the home screen.
- The UI uses shadcn/ui components and looks clean.

### Dependencies
- Epic 1 must be complete

comments.author: ryan.porter
comments.text: Implemented apps/shell with React 19 + Vite 6 + Tailwind v4 + React Router v7. Home screen renders 3 placeholder app cards. App view has three named slot areas (titlebar, main, settings). Settings panel slides in from right. Shell chrome always visible. Build passes: 267KB JS bundle.
